ygData.subject: Role/Anon/norm
ygData.msgSnippet: I was just wondering, how many leave there status normal? You know, /who tells level class name guild. I use /role with my warrior and get constantly asked
ygData.messageBody:
I was just wondering, how many leave there
'status' normal? You know, /who tells level class name
guild. I use /role with my warrior and get constantly
asked for heals, buffs, sows. I guess a wood elf
warrior is kind of rare. My druid stays fully
identifiable. /who tells you all about him. And yet, believe it
or not, I rarely am asked to sow or buff/heal
people. I also find it amusing of the number of people
who /shout need sow plz constantly but never check to
see who can do it. They just expect someone to be
able/willing to do so at their command. And some of them don't
have any patience. I don't keep sow memmed. I have
wolf form. Who need spirit when you can be one? You
tell them just a sec while I mem it, they say NM and
run off. :P to them. If you're on the Rathe and I'm
around, send me a tell that you saw me on this board and
I'll sow you if you're close by.<br><br>Timmye
Cousteau<br>The Wolf of Karana
